title: (x) Oakley sunglasses logo - custom version of URW California Grotesk {Fabio}
content:
Does anyone know what the Oakley sunglasses font is? Is it custom? This was the best picture I could find online and it was too light for whatafont to identify. Thanks to anyone who can help me out!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [OAKLEY LOGO.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/typophile.com/files/OAKLEY%20LOGO.jpg) | 30.08 KB |
author: figrsk8r

comments.content:
\> This was the best picture I could find online

And what about that:

[http://oakley.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/oakley.com/ "http://oakley.com/")
we've had [this one before](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/42852.html?1092547434) with no solution.

Oakley typeface is a custom version of URW California Grotesk,  
called Bark!

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/california-grotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/california-grotesk/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/california-grotesk/")

thanks Fabio. Curious to hear more about the Bark version. Have any more info?

I wasn't thorough with the search.

[http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/66811.html?1110244122](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/66811.html?1110244122 "http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/66811.html?1110244122")

Thanks you for your help. I got mine from the same site, David, I just made a copy so I could try and find it through whatafont. But I appreciate everyone's help, a client I have loves the look and wants to adapt it to a new logo we are working on and I had never seen it before.

Thanks again!!

BJHarvey: Sorry, I dnt have more info about this type. This url have a catalogs of products in pdf format with the Bark in use:  
 [http://oakley.com/downloads/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/oakley.com/downloads/ "http://oakley.com/downloads/")
I know oakley are more sport sunglasses rather then [designer sunglasses](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/www.summersunglasses.com/) but for more pictures try searching flickr.

[Hologram sunglasses](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/www.wholesalesunglassusa.com/hologram-sunglasses-s/158.htm) : Save time and money by ordering your sunglasses wholesale from WholesaleSunglassesUSA. We are the original manufacturer and importer on all our sunglasses, which gives us unprecedented control over the quality of our products.

I am using sunglasses for caring my eyes in summer whether. So, I am happy to travel anywhere with my glasses. It is most important and the uses of sunglasses are also hlepful to all the people.  
 [Angela](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175345/http:/www.sunglasspicks.com/)
